channel.title: 🏢 University of Luxembourg on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: LongKey: Keyphrase Extraction for Long Documents
item.description: LongKey: A novel framework excels at extracting keyphrases from lengthy documents using an encoder-based language model and max-pooling, outperforming existing methods across diverse datasets.
